wiki.content: This song was featured in the 2001 film American Pie 2, during a memorable scene where Jason Biggs' character Jim superglues his hand to his crotch. It was also featured on the video game Karaoke Revolution and is featured in Guitar Hero On Tour: Decades for the Nintendo DS. It is a cover of Michael Jackson's "Smooth Criminal". User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: This song was featured in the 2001 film American Pie 2, during a memorable scene where Jason Biggs' character Jim superglues his hand to his crotch. It was also featured on the video game Karaoke Revolution and is featured in Guitar Hero On Tour: Decades for the Nintendo DS. It is a cover of Michael Jackson's "Smooth Criminal".
